title: How to Make Cabbage Curry in Andhra Style

steps.headline: Add chopped cabbage to a large pot or saucepan.
Wash the sliced cabbage under running water.
steps.description: Then drain and add fresh water. Once done, bring the water to a boil.

steps.headline: Add the Bengal gram.
steps.description: Add salt after 5 more minutes of cooking.

steps.headline: Cover the cooked cabbage and gram with a lid or plate after 10 minutes.
Drain the stock water.
steps.description: Hold the pot or pan with a cloth, or use a pair of tongs.

steps.headline: Add oil to a large frying pan.
Add red chilies, cumin seeds, mustard seeds and white lentils.
steps.description: Sauté them for a few minutes.

steps.headline: Sprinkle the grated fresh coconut over the dish.
Serve the cabbage curry with rice or rotis.

tyn: Large pot or saucepan with lid or cover
text: Preparing the Sliced Cabbage Add chopped cabbage to a large pot or saucepan.  Wash the sliced cabbage under running water. Then drain and add fresh water. Once done, bring the water to a boil. Add the Bengal gram. Add salt after 5 more minutes of cooking. Mix together well.  Cover the cooked cabbage and gram with a lid or plate after 10 minutes.  Drain the stock water. Hold the pot or pan with a cloth, or use a pair of tongs. Frying the Cabbage Add oil to a large frying pan.  Add red chilies, cumin seeds, mustard seeds and white lentils. Sauté them for a few minutes. Add the boiled cabbage mixture.  Mix well.  Add turmeric powder.  Mix well.  Sprinkle the grated fresh coconut over the dish.  Mix well.  Serve the cabbage curry with rice or rotis.
sentences: Preparing the Sliced Cabbage Add chopped cabbage to a large pot or saucepan.
Wash the sliced cabbage under running water.
Then drain and add fresh water.
Once done, bring the water to a boil.
Add the Bengal gram.
Add salt after 5 more minutes of cooking.
Mix together well.
Cover the cooked cabbage and gram with a lid or plate after 10 minutes.
Drain the stock water.
Hold the pot or pan with a cloth, or use a pair of tongs.
Frying the Cabbage Add oil to a large frying pan.
Add red chilies, cumin seeds, mustard seeds and white lentils.
Sauté them for a few minutes.
Add the boiled cabbage mixture.
Mix well.
Add turmeric powder.
Mix well.
Sprinkle the grated fresh coconut over the dish.
Mix well.
Serve the cabbage curry with rice or rotis.
